custom_prefix.Name: [EXPERIMENTAL] Custom Prefix
custom_prefix.Hint: Replaces the entire hostname of the S3 URL. The URL will be [Custom Prefix][Path with leading / removed]

path_style.Name: Path Style URL
path_style.Hint: If checked, it will convert the URLs to Path Style URLs.

custom_style.Name: Custom Style URL
custom_style.Hint: If checked, it will replace the URLs with the custom prefix. Path Style will be ignored
